title: Our fragile coast: The Coast, a question of balance
creator_credit: David Hughes and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: The first half of this compilation tape focuses on erosion and deposition at Port Campbell, the Gippsland Lakes and Port Phillip, to be used in conjunction with the Earth in Action topic of the Year 12 Geography course; the second shows how competing human interests could destroy the coastal ecology.
